issues.description: Solution PersonController defines a constructor with parameters (String baseUrl, Duration timeout), but the problem statement’s UML and H05E01ClientApplication assume a no-argument constructor—this mismatch will prevent instantiating PersonController as shown and block students from running the application
issues.suggested_fix: Either add a no-argument constructor to PersonController (initializing webClient and the persons list with default settings) or update H05E01ClientApplication to call the new constructor, aligning all artifacts under the same instantiation signature
